Reviews.Content: hello  i just  getting  to  this  kind of  touch screen  devices  and  feels very good  its  the  size  i  was looking plus still have cd dvd  player  the  all machine  very  cute

ProductInfo.Features:
Touchpad supports multi-touch gestures without on/off button
2.7GHz AMD Elite Quad-Core A8-5545M accelerated processor; AMD RadeonTM HD 8510G graphics
14" diagonal HD BrightView LED-backlit touchscreen (1,366x768) display
750GB (5,400RPM) hard drive with HP ProtectSmart hard drive protection; 6GB DDR3L SDRAM (2 DIMM)
Genuine Windows® 8 operating system
ProductInfo.Name: HP Pavilion TouchSmart 14-n018us Notebook
